metadata.title: CVE-2019-5064 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: An exploitable heap buffer overflow vulnerability exists in the datastructure persistence functionality of OpenCV, before version 4.2.0. Aspecially crafted JSON file can cause a buffer overflow, resulting inmultiple heap corruptions and potentially code execution. An attacker canprovide a specially crafted file to trigger this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: opencv: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
